turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, can you order me a drink from Starbucks on Speedway and Pantano, in Tucson, Az, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course, I would be happy to! What can I order for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like the Caramel Cloud Macchiato, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size Caramel Cloud Macchiato would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like the tall, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, you'd like a tall Caramel Cloud Macchiato. What kind of milk would you like in that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want it made with whole milk, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, that's a tall Caramel Cloud Macchiato with whole milk. Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Is it possible to get that with whipped cream?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It comes with cold whipped foam, but I can order it with whipped cream on the top, if you desire.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I would like the whipped cream on top!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So that's one tall Caramel Cloud Macchiato, with whole milk, and whipped cream on top.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's it, exactly.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And you would like it ordered at the Speedway and Pantano location in Tucson, Arizona, correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Perfect. I am placing the order right now.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: All right, your tall Caramel Cloud Macchiato with whole milk and whipped cream will be ready for pickup at the Speedway and Pantano location in Tucson Arizona in about fifteen minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Fabulous!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I will be sending your receipt to your mobile phone as a text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Awesome, thank you again!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You're welcome! Have a great night!
